title: (x) Grandpeople navigation - ITC Avant Garde Gothic w/ Alternates {Tiff}
content:
i feel realy frustrated right now, i know i know the title to this font, but i just cant seem remeber right now. i looked through the typefaces on my own computer lightly, but i was hoping yo guys could know it faster. it’s the light sans serif for the words “design, illustration, contact,” ect. on the left at [http://www.grandpeople.org/home.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111042625/http:/www.grandpeople.org/home.html)

thank you so much!

alex-o
author: alexhb

comments.content: That would be Avant Garde .. best version from FontShop by Elsner+Flake
see, i knew it. i feel so dumb right now. i was thinking that it was french title, and all the only sans serif en francais could remember was Avenir. thanks!
No Problem. :^) I do that all of the time.
